entry.def: Underarm means in or for the areas under your arms, where they are joined to your body.
You use underarm to describe actions, such as throwing a ball, in which you do not raise your arm above your shoulder.

means.word_mean: 1. with hand brought forward and up from below shoulder level;
1. with the hand swung below shoulder level';
